# Pluralist Democracy Party (Turkey)

| abbreviation     = ÇDP
| membership       = 236
| slogan           = "Çoğunlukçu değil, çoğulcu demokrasi" (Not majoritarian, but pluralist democracy)
}}
Pluralist Democracy Party (; ÇDP for short) is a political party of Turkey founded on 15 August 2014. Faruk Arslandok is the general chairman. It defends the brotherhood and freedom of people. It is a party founded by Circassians in Turkey, and is also known as the "Circassian Solidarity Party" in unofficial media. ÇDP entered the June 2015 general elections in Turkey with independent candidates.
